2164.subject: HCOM
2164.descrlong:
Prepares students to report and write magazine articles about social issues. Outcomes include learning advanced journalistic and creative nonfiction interviewing, reporting techniques, and writing short feature and in-depth magazine stories. Focuses on training students to write a magazine story from conception and pitching the story to a magazine through reporting, organizing, writing, rewriting, and editing. Requires instructor consent.

[Prereq: (GE Areas A1 and A2 and A3) and (HCOM 385)]
